title:
Meet
Our Team
description:
We are a global team passionate about bringing ideas to life. With diverse backgrounds and skill sets spanning from the United States to every corner of the globe, we collaborate seamlessly to produce effective solutions for our clients.

Our international presence brings unique perspectives, cultural insights, and 24/7 availability to every project. Together, we are committed to delivering impactful work that exceeds expectations.
globalTeam:
A Truly Global Team: Our strength lies in our diversity. With team members and partners across the United States and around the world, we bring together unique perspectives, cultural insights, and expertise from every corner of the globe. From Washington D.C. to Addis Ababa, from New York to beyond, our distributed team works seamlessly to deliver exceptional results 24/7.

This global presence allows us to understand diverse markets, serve clients across time zones, and bring world-class talent to every project.
subtitle:
We deliver
exceptional results.
note: * The team behind The LivingStone Solution

col1_items.name: Oliyad Deyasa
col1_items.bio: Visionary leader with extensive experience in project management and business development. Passionate about transforming innovative ideas into successful digital solutions.

col1_items.name: Deborah Wondmu
col1_items.bio: Expert in contract management and client relations with a proven track record of successful project deliveries and stakeholder management.

col2_items.name: Mikias Tulu
col2_items.bio: Technical expert specializing in system architecture and operations management. Ensures seamless technical execution and maintains high-quality standards.

col2_items.name: Blen Anteneh
col2_items.bio: Strategic business administrator with expertise in operations, finance, and organizational development. Drives efficiency and growth across all business functions.
